items.sentence: I'll never forget visiting Boston last summer.
I tried my best to get Tom to stop doing that.
People were lined up to ride the Ferris wheel.
Tom was kind enough to show me how to do that.
It took us longer to do that than we expected.
Would you be able to come here again tomorrow?
By the time I got there, Tom had already left.
Have you already talked to someone about this?
Tom didn't seem to want to tell me about that.
That's what I learned when I was in Australia.
We asked Tom when he was planning to get here.
Last week's discussion wasn't very productive.
Tom wants to have his picture taken with Mary.
It went about as well as I could've hoped for.
You don't know me as well as you think you do.
This holds true for husbands as well as wives.
I'm not good at French, but I have studied it.
If you don't mind, I'd rather speak in French.
Tom usually tries not to drive through cities.
Tom was afraid that people would laugh at him.
